code: import axios from"axios";export default{getLatestItems:function getLatestItems(title){return axios.get("/api/items");},getItem:function getItem(id){return axios.get("/api/items/"+id);},saveItem:function saveItem(itemData){return axios.post("/api/items",itemData);},saveOrder:function saveOrder(orderDetails){return axios.post("/api/order",orderDetails);},saveUser:function saveUser(userData){return axios.post("/api/user/",userData);},removeOrder:function removeOrder(id){return axios.delete("/api/order/"+id);},deleteItem:function deleteItem(id){return axios.delete("/api/items/"+id);}};
